data.text: @wsbgnl "You should close the barn doors after the horses have all escaped, ranged widely, reproduced prodogiously, and established feral colonies."
@wsbgnl If you have symptoms or test positive, stay home.
@wsbgnl Update from the CDC: “fuck it, why do we care if you all get sick?” This shit is breaking my brain

@Vortex_warrior @AnaSantanello @wsbgnl As if they cared about that.  We only have to wear mask when it benefits corporate interests.  Until then, get your ass back to work and be prepared to sacrifice your life for the financial benefit of your boss.
@wsbgnl Don't tell them that. People don't understand sarcasm and will take it as gospel.
